name: NEAppPushProvider
desc: An object that creates and maintains a persistent network connection to a local push server.

items.name: var providerConfiguration: [String : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary that contains current vendor-specific configuration parameters.

items.name: func stop(with: NEProviderStopReason, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Indicates that the framework needs to stop the provider.

items.name: func handleTimerEvent()
items.desc: Indicates a periodic status check from the framework to the provider.

items.name: func reportIncomingCall(userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any])
items.desc: Informs the manager about an incoming call.
